item.title: 博弈论与多智能体强化学习（MARL）术语对比
item.description: 本文整理了一份详细的术语对比表，帮助理解博弈论和多智能体强化学习在概念上的联系与区别。

item.title: Optimal Live Selling Strategies for Brands: The Role of Effort Costs
item.description: This study present an analytical model to identify the optimal live selling strategy for maximizing brand profits. Published in Information Technology and Management.
